channel.title: ERA on Dreambooker
channel.description: Recent content in ERA on Dreambooker

item.title: Initializing the WRF model with ECMWF ERA-Interim reanalysis
item.description:
Summarization

To summarise, you need three separate data files from the reanalysis data:

  1. Pressure level data (or model levels)
  2. Surface variable data
  3. Fixed data.
